TopicTitle: CTD when entering VAB - help interpreting logs

Articles.Content:
I've recently started experiencing fairly regular CTD's when entering the VAB.  There are a few generic errors in the logs but I can't see any particular mod standing out that might be causing the issue.  Any help interpreting the output and/or crash logs would be appreciated.

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1Uqq3-HDf02FA9fNJVTDglfT8vKLjdl1Q
If you could, possibly host each file separately, instead of in a zip, that way people don't have to download a random file onto their computer, thanks.

Crashes on scene transitions are quite often due to running out of memory because the game has some severe load spikes on those transitions. And considering that you try to run every mod available and that even your paging file is pretty much full, I would conider this to be a likely culprit.

Interesting.  I'll have a closer look at perfmon to see what's happening during transitions.  I've successfully run more mods than this on other play throughs and it's not an atypical selection, hence wondering if the problem lies with one specific mod and if there's an easier diagnostic approach than trying them one by one.  Would allocating some VRAM from SSD help?  (Or just buy more RAM)...
